amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Waterworks; water supply; pollution; power to prevent.
amendatorysection.para: The jurisdiction of a city of the second class or village to prevent any pollution or injury to the stream or source of water for the supply of waterworks constructed under sections 17-530 to 17-532 shall extend fifteen miles beyond its corporate limits.

annotation.para: A village is limited to taking only such property as is presently necessary for the purposes described in section 17-531. Engelhaupt v. Village of Butte, 248 Neb. 827, 539 N.W.2d 430 (1995).
